name: Datadog
longDescription: Datadog Application Performance Monitoring (APM) provides AI-powered code-level distributed tracing from browser and mobile applications to backend services and databases. By seamlessly correlating traces with logs, metrics, real user monitoring (RUM) data, security signals, and other telemetry, Datadog APM enables you to detect and resolve root causes faster, improve application performance and security posture, optimize resource consumption, and collaborate more effectively to deliver the best user experience possible.
pricingDetails: Starts at $15 per host per month. Pay-as-you-go or subscription terms available. Service includes unlimited integrations per monitored host. 14-day free trial included in all plans. All plans include custom metrics and events. Pro plans include 13 months data retention, metric alerts, and email support.

name: Adobe Creative Cloud

Individuals: $52.99 per month

name: Google Cloud
longDescription: Google Cloud Platform is cloud-based suite of solutions that allows users to create anything from websites to complex applications for businesses of all sizes across a range of industries. Google Cloud Platform offers a scalable data warehouse powered by cloud storage and machine learning, as well as relational databases for transactions, complex queries, and more.\n\nIt features AI and machine learning capabilities, including Vertex AI for custom model deployment, enhanced by Gemini's foundation models for generative AI. The platform provides data analytics tools like BigQuery for scalable analytics and Looker for data insights and visualization. For infrastructure, Google Cloud offers Compute Engine for virtual machines, Kubernetes Engine and Cloud Run for container management, Cloud Storage for object storage, and Cloud SQL and Spanner for managed databases. Security is ensured with Cloud Armor, Google Threat Intelligence, and Mandiant Consulting Services.
pricingDetails:
All customers get free hands-on experience with 20+ Google Cloud products including Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, and BigQuery free of charge, within specified monthly usage limits.

When clients stay within the Free Tier limits, these resources are not charged against Free Trial credits or to the Cloud Billing account's payment method after the trial ends.

Each product has its specific pricing and is usually charged per usage per month. Please refer to the specific product pricing page on Google cloud Website for more details.

name: WebHR
longDescription: WebHR is a cloud-based HR software designed to streamline human resources tasks for businesses. It offers tools for employee management, including tracking personal details, job roles, and performance. WebHR simplifies time and attendance tracking, helping businesses manage work hours, shifts, and absences. It automates payroll processing, generating pay slips and ensuring tax compliance.\n\nThe platform supports performance management by setting goals, conducting appraisals, and providing feedback. WebHR includes leave management features, allowing employees to request and track time off. It also helps with recruitment, from posting job openings to tracking applicants. The system has an employee self-service portal for staff to access their data, request leave, and view pay slips. WebHR aims to save businesses time, improve HR efficiency, and enhance employee experience through a centralized platform.
pricingDetails: Pricing is based on the number of users, and starts at $3/employee/month for 5 employees.\nThe price per employee decreases as the number of employees increases.

The system incorporates advanced generative models, including transformers and autoencoders, to effectively understand and encode input text. It then decodes this information to produce visually compelling images that accurately reflect the provided textual descriptions.

DALL·E 3 has the potential to find applications in various domains, offering content creators, artists, and designers a tool to transform textual concepts into visually striking representations, enabling a new level of creative expression.
pricingDetails: Price dependent on usage and image size. \n

name: Krisp AI Meeting Assistant
longDescription:
The AI Meeting Assistant from Krisp.ai is an innovative solution designed to revolutionize online meetings. It utilizes advanced Artificial Intelligence technology to automate the transcription and summarization process during meetings, improving efficiency and accuracy.

The AI Meeting Assistant is designed to save time and eliminate the need for manual note-taking during meetings. Krisp's AI algorithms work seamlessly in real-time, transcribing and summarizing meeting content accurately and comprehensively. This feature ensures effortless and quick sharing of meeting summaries to meeting participants without the need for manual editing.

Krisp.ai prides itself on its bot-free approach, ensuring a more natural and human-like conversation experience. Other solutions in the market rely on pre-programmed bots, limiting their capabilities and accuracy. Krisp's approach uses true Artificial Intelligence, providing a more flexible and adaptative assistant that can handle complex discussions
pricingDetails:

Personal Pro: $5/month (billed yearly)

name: Replit
longDescription:
Replit turns your ideas into apps, fast. 

With Replit, anyone—technical or non-technical—can build and deploy fully-functional, full-stack apps directly from their browser, without any installation, setup, or configuration. Replit's Agent and Assistant enables you to create entire applications from natural language, turning bullet points into working apps in minutes. Its built-in tools, including databases and deployment features, allow you to launch with a single click. 

Replit bridges the gap between non-technical and technical users, driving collaboration for everything from product roadmaps and prototypes to custom APIs and internal tools. Replit empowers everyone to not just consume software but to create it, transforming app development into an accessible, instant, and impactful process. Go from 'why doesn't this app exist?' to building it for yourself.

name: Pitch Avatar

- generate a script in any language, even if it's different from the language on the slides.

pricingDetails:
Synerise offers a variety of flexible pricing models that accommodate the growth dynamics of each client’s business. The costs are based on the number of interactions, or Data Points (DPs) of the client’s systems with the platform. Each Data Point represents an event registered by the platform e.g. a page visit, a recommendation shown, a pop-up, a transaction, emails sent, web-pushes etc.

Synerise offers three pricing and billing models:

Pay-As-You-Go: based on consumption measured by DPs in any corresponding period (a month/quarter)

Revenue-Sharing: the fee is a percentage-based honorarium and linked to the uplift in revenue resulting from the deployment of the platform features and functionalities.

Flat Fee: for enterprise clients who opt for a “fully-fledged“, on-premise, or private cloud installation.

Please Contact Synerise for more information.
